org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution.filterbank

Class LawsTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution.filterbank.FilterBank
      • org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution.filterbank.LawsTextureBase
        • org.openimaj.image.processing.convolution.filterbank.LawsTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageAnalyser<FImage>

    @Reference(type=Inproceedings,
           author="Laws, K. I.",
           title="{Rapid Texture Identification}",
           year="1980",
           booktitle="Proc. SPIE Conf. Image Processing for Missile Guidance",
           pages={"376","","380"},
           customData={"citeulike-article-id","2335645","keywords","bibtex-import","posted-at","2008-02-05 15:32:50","priority","2"})
public class LawsTexture
extends LawsTextureBase
    Implementation of Laws texture energy measures, based on the description in Shapiro and Stockman Section 7.3.4.

    Nine texture energy images are created by convolving with the 16 base 5x5 Laws filters, and then computing the energy for each pixel by summing the absolute pixel values in a macro window about that pixel.

    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
